mdRecord.dcterms:title: Aviator, The, detail view
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Borglum, Gutzon (American sculptor, 1867-1941) [sculptor]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Closeup showing tablet on wall to south of statue

The sculpture is a bronze statue commissioned in honor of University alumnus James Rogers McConnell’s heroism and courage in World War I, as a member of the Lafayette Escadrille. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Aviator_(Charlottesville,_Virginia) [work]
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: James Murray Howard University of Virginia Historic Buildings and Grounds Collection
